title: Police launch investigation after child is found dead in home
text:
Police are investigating the death of a child in a seaside town.

Emergency services were called to the Arcot Park area in Sidmouth, east Devon, at 5pm on Tuesday after reports of concern for the welfare of a child.

But the child - whose sex and age has not been revealed - was declared dead at the scene.

Emergency services were called to the Arcot Park area in Sidmouth, east Devon

A Devon and Cornwall police spokesman said: 'This is a desperately sad and tragic incident for everyone involved and our thoughts are with the child's family.'

A spokesman said the death is not being treated as suspicious and inquiries are continuing on behalf of the coroner.
description: Emergency services were called to the Arcot Park area in Sidmouth, east Devon, on Tuesday after reports of concern for the welfare of a child. The child was declared dead at the scene.
